t = int(raw_input())
 
for _ in range(t):
    n, men, women, children = map(int, raw_input().split())
    max_women = min(women, 2*men)
    max_children = min(children, 4*(men+max_women))
 
    rC = min(n*4/5,max_children)
    rW = min(max_women, (n-rC)*2/3) 
    rM = min(men,n-rW-rC)
    print rM,rW,rC
